hcrdata 0.1.0
  • News
  • Reference

Reference

Main Function

hcrfetch()

function to fetch data directly

Connector to Kobo

kobo.conn()

Connect to UNHCR kobo server: http://kobo.unhcr.org

kobo.index()

Get a list of projects in kobo http://kobo.unhcr.org

Connector to RIDL

ridl.conn()

Connect to UNHCR ridl server http://ridl.unhcr.org

ridl.index()

Get a list of projects in ridl http://ridl.unhcr.org

Connector to MDL

mdl.conn()

Connect to UNHCR mdl server http://microdata.unhcr.org

mdl.index()

Get a list of projects in mdl http://microdata.unhcr.org

Addins Function

hcrindex()

fill empty index

empty.index()

prepare an empty index

hcrbrowse()

Launch the addin interface

server()

Server part of the shiny interface

Contents
